notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyDesc: Actions will appear here in real-time

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your data extraction and approval workflow
dashboard.hitlDescription: All extracted data requires manual review before export. Navigate to Records to approve, reject, or edit extraction results. This ensures data quality and allows for human verification of automated extractions.

extraction.title: Data Extraction
extraction.subtitle: Extract data from forms, emails, and invoices
extraction.reviewBeforeSaving: Review the extracted data before saving
extraction.batchDescription: This will extract data from all {count} files and create records pending review.
extraction.autoProcess: All files will be processed automatically
extraction.savedAsPending: Extracted data will be saved as pending records
extraction.reviewInRecords: You can review each record in the Records page
extraction.approveRejectEdit: Approve, reject, or edit each record before export
extraction.batchFailedMsg: An error occurred during batch extraction.
extraction.hitlNotice: Preview extraction results before saving. All saved records require manual approval before export.
extraction.extractionFailedMsg: Failed to extract {filename}. Please try again.
extraction.saveFailedMsg: Failed to save {filename}. Please try again.
extraction.loadFailed: Failed to load files. Make sure the backend is running.

records.title: Records
records.subtitle: Review, approve, and manage extraction records
records.noRecordsMessage: Extract some files to create records.
records.recordNotFoundMessage: The requested record could not be found.

approval.title: Approve Record
approval.description: Confirm that the extracted data is correct and ready for export.
approval.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this approval...

rejection.title: Reject Record
rejection.description: Provide a reason for rejecting this extraction. This record will not be included in exports.
rejection.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why this record is being rejected...
rejection.reasonNote: This reason will be recorded for audit purposes.

edit.title: Edit Record Data
edit.description: Modify the extracted data before approval. Changes are saved separately from the original extraction.
edit.updateSuccessMsg: The record has been updated successfully.
edit.updateFailedMsg: Failed to update the record. Please try again.

export.title: Export Records
export.allApproved: Export all approved and edited records
export.exportNote: By default, only approved and edited records will be exported. Pending records must be reviewed first.
export.exportFailedMsg: Failed to export records. Please try again.

search.title: AI Semantic Search
search.embeddingsNeeded: {count} records need AI indexing for search
search.modelLoadingMessage: AI model is loading in background. Search will be available shortly.

batch.approvalError: An error occurred during batch approval.
batch.rejectionError: An error occurred during batch rejection.
batch.reasonRequiredMsg: Please provide a reason for rejection.
batch.notesPlaceholder: Add notes for all approved records...
batch.rejectionPlaceholder: Reason for rejecting all selected records...

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets Integration
googleSheets.description: Sync your extraction records to Google Sheets for centralized data management.
googleSheets.notConfiguredMsg: Google Sheets integration requires administrator setup.
googleSheets.configuredMsg: Google Sheets is configured and ready
googleSheets.sheetIdHelp: You can enter either the ID or the full spreadsheet URL
googleSheets.errorPermissionMsg: Share the spreadsheet with the service account (see instructions below).
googleSheets.customSheetDesc: To use your own Google Spreadsheet:
googleSheets.step1: Create a new spreadsheet in your Google Drive
googleSheets.step2: Click Share and add the email below as Editor
googleSheets.step3: Copy the ID from the spreadsheet URL
googleSheets.step4: Paste the ID above and click Sync

exportSettings.title: Export Settings
exportSettings.modeDesc: Choose what happens after approving records
exportSettings.manualDesc: Export dialog opens after batch approve. You choose when to download.
exportSettings.excelDesc: Automatically downloads Excel file after approving records.
exportSettings.sheetsDesc: Automatically syncs to Google Sheets after approving records.
exportSettings.sheetsDisabled: Requires Google Sheets configuration. Contact admin.
exportSettings.excelEnabledMsg: Records will be automatically downloaded as Excel after approval.
exportSettings.sheetsEnabledMsg: Records will be automatically synced to Google Sheets after approval.
exportSettings.autoIncludeRejectedDesc: Also sync rejected records when auto-syncing to Google Sheets.
exportSettings.settingsErrorMsg: Failed to update settings. Please try again.
